message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it would be highly beneficial to you. I'm asking for $10,000. What are your thoughts?
I'm interested in the product, but $10,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $7,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $10,000 represents a fair price considering the value it brings, I'm willing to negotiate.  How about $9,000? This feels like a good compromise.

I'm still a bit far from $9,000. I was thinking more along the lines of $6,500. I really believe this product would be a great fit for me, and I'm willing to make a serious offer. Can you meet me at this price?
